msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at left and right. Kollesis in the middle of the right column. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. Unusually narrow left margin (max. 1.5 cm.) and wide right margin (at minimum5 cm.). (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Ptolemaios, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Petheus, brother with the same mother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 200)
Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 159)
Sambas, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 223)
Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamarres (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)

Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Maron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambathion, mother Taseus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 187)
Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 163)
Sempronius, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Nilous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 228)
Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambas, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Kastor alias Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Melitous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)
Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Horos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tauris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Neilos, son of Louppos, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 190)
Herakles, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 168)
Sarapion, son of Heras the older, grandson of Herakles, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Aphrodisios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 157)
Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 198)
Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)

Aunes, son of Aunes, grandson of Hermas, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 157)
Longinus alias Gemellus, fatherless, mother Taphois (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Hermation, slave of Isidoros alias Longinus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 163)
Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 151)
Chairemon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollauthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 243)
Heron, son of Achillas, grandson of Onnophris, mother Didymarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Petermouthis, son of Kastor, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Ptollas, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Vettia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 221)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " (Column) 2[6]:;Ptolemaios, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 20;;Petheus, brother with the same mother, drachmas 12;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus the older, grandson of Theabennis, mother Tamarres, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Apynchis, grandson of Aunes, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 88, obols 28;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 8;;Maron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambathion, mother Taseus, drachmas 8;;Herieus the older, son of Horos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion, obols 28;;Sempronius, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Nilous, drachmas 16;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambas, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4, obols 20;;Kastor alias Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Melitous, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, obols 28;;Horos, son of Petaus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Neilos, son of Louppos, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonarion, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 64, obols 18;;Herakles, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Heras the older, grandson of Herakles, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 28;;Aphrodisios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapsais, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Aunes, son of Aunes, grandson of Hermas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4, obols;;Longinus alias Gemellus, fatherless, mother Taphois, drachmas 16;;Hermation, slave of Isidoros alias Longinus, drachmas 16;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 40;;for the 12th year the same, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Achillas, grandson of Onnophris, mother Didymarion, drachmas 12;;Petermouthis, son of Kastor, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 12;;Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Ptollas, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Vettia, drachmas 20;;in total for the day drachmas 192, obols 27 of which for the 12th year drachmas 4;;Phamenoth;11;;Hatres, son of Petheus, grandson of Herakles, mother Thaesis, drachmas 28;;Herakles, brother with the same mother, drachmas 28;;Pharmouthi 13;;Heras, son of Samanelais, drachmas 12."
